name: Heavy Machine Construc City
description:
It’s a great challenging gameplay while you were used to play house flip construction or may be bridge construction but now this is something change to your eye. Join the water construction world and feel like a real road builder. Pipeline construction is a 3d platform game where you have to work as a pipeline operator. Put your engineering skills, intuition and smarts to test in this village pipeline and have fun. You need to put in your pipes tunnel skills in this new pipeline construction games and enjoy the fun of build pipeline.
Features:
- Different surroundings of cross country pipeline
- Amazing missions of connecting pipelines
- Get ready for fun creating plumber game
- High quality sound effect for road side pipeline construction
- Optimize your own city for new design of pipeline game.
